resources.string:
==Discovery== **Discovered by:** Urbain Le Verrier, John Couch Adams, Johann Galle
 **Discovery date:** September 23, 1846
==Orbital characteristics== **Distance from sun:** 4,503 million km (30.1 AU)
 **Eccentricity:** 0.0112
 **Orbital period:** 164.79 years
 **Average orbital speed:** 5.43 km/s
 **Inclination to ecliptic:** 1.768°
 **Satellites:** 13
==Physical characteristics== **Equatorial radius:** 24,764 km (3.88 Earths)
 **Flattening:** 0.0171
 **Volume:** 6.254×10^^13^^ km³ (57.7 Earths)
 **Mass:** 1.0243×10^^26^^ kg (17.1 Earths)
 **Mean density:** 1.638 g/cm³
 **Equatorial surface gravity:** 11.15 m/s² (1.14 g)
 **Escape velocity:** 23.5 km/s
 **Sidereal rotation period:** 16h 6m 36s
 **Equatorial rotation velocity:** 9,660 km/h
 **Axial tilt:** 28.32°
 **Bond albedo:** 0.290
 **Mean surface temp** (1 bar level)**:** 72K
==Atmosphere== **Scale height:** 19.7km
 **Composition:**
 80 ± 3.2% hydrogen (H,,2,,)
 19 ± 3.2% helium
 1.5 ± 0.5% methane
 ~0.019% hydrogen deuteride (HD)
 ~0.00015% ethane
 **Ices:**
 ammonia, water, ammonium hydrosulfide (NH,,4,,SH), methane?


Find out more on [[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neptune|wikipedia]].
